question: What are the attributes of the business located at 123 Main St, CityVille?
cypher:
MATCH (business:Business)
WHERE business.address="123 Main St, CityVille"
RETURN business, business.id, business.name, business.address, business.city, business.state, business.location

question: Retrieve the name and description of the label with id L001.
cypher:
MATCH (labelNode:Label)
WHERE labelNode.id="L001"
RETURN labelNode, labelNode.description

question: Could you tell me the name of the city located in the state of California?
cypher:
MATCH (business:Business)
WHERE business.state="California"
RETURN business, business.city

question: What is the id and text of a review that was submitted on 2023-09-15?
cypher:
MATCH (review:Review)
WHERE review.date = date('2023-09-15')
RETURN review, review.id, review.text

question: Find the name and partition number of the photo with the caption Beautiful sunset at the beach.
cypher:
MATCH (photo:Photo)
WHERE photo.caption="Beautiful sunset at the beach"
RETURN photo, photo.partition

question: Please supply the username and user id for the individual associated with user id U100.
cypher:
MATCH (searchedUser:User)
WHERE searchedUser.id="U100"
RETURN searchedUser, searchedUser.name, searchedUser.id

question: What is the total number of unique business entries listed in the city of New York?
cypher:
MATCH (business:Business)-[locatedIn:IN_CITY]->(city:City)
WHERE city.name="New York"
RETURN COUNT(DISTINCT business)

question: What is the number of reviews authored by users in the year 2022?
cypher:
MATCH (user:User)-[wrote:WROTE]->(review:Review)
WHERE review.date.year = 2022
RETURN COUNT(DISTINCT review)

question: Can you calculate the average number of stars given across all reviews?
cypher:
MATCH (review:Review)
RETURN AVG(review.stars) AS AverageStars

question: What is the count of photos which have the label food in their description, assuming all photos related to food contain this label?
cypher:
MATCH (photo:Photo)-[hasLabel:HAS_LABEL]->(label:Label)
WHERE label.description CONTAINS "food"
RETURN COUNT(DISTINCT photo)

question: Could you tell me how many users currently have more than 500 friends in the system?
cypher:
MATCH (user:User)-[friendship:FRIENDS]->(friend:User)
WITH user, COUNT(friendship) AS friendCount
WHERE friendCount > 500
RETURN COUNT(user)

question: What is the maximum score attributed to labels assigned to the photos taken in the year 2023?
cypher:
MATCH (photo:Photo)-[hasLabel:HAS_LABEL]->(label:Label)
WHERE photo.partition = 2023
RETURN MAX(hasLabel.score)

question: Can you show me the names and average stars of reviews written for businesses in the Fast Food category located in San Francisco that were reviewed after January 1st, 2023?
cypher:
MATCH (business:Business)-[inCity:IN_CITY]->(city:City), (category:Category)<-[inCategory:IN_CATEGORY]-(business)-[for:REVIEWS]-(review:Review)-[write:WROTE]-(user:User)
WHERE city.name="San Francisco" AND category.name="Fast Food" AND review.date >= date("2023-01-01")
RETURN business, inCity, city, category, inCategory, review, for, write, user, business.name, AVG(review.stars)

question: For the business Joes Diner in Cleveland, could you retrieve the name and ID of all users who have reviewed this business and are also labeled as friends of Mary Allen?
cypher:
MATCH (mary:User {name:"Mary Allen"})-[friend:FRIENDS]->(user:User)-[wrote:WROTE]->(review:Review)-[reviews:REVIEWS]->(business:Business {name:"Joe's Diner"}), (business)-[inCity:IN_CITY]->(city:City {name:"Cleveland"})
RETURN mary, friend, user, wrote, review, reviews, business, inCity, city, user.id, user.name

question: List the descriptions of labels associated with photos for businesses that have been written a review by Alice Bobson, along with the review text and business location.
cypher:
MATCH (alice:User {name:"Alice Bobson"})-[wroteReview:WROTE]->(review:Review)-[reviewToBusiness:REVIEWS]->(business:Business)-[businessToPhoto:HAS_PHOTO]->(photo:Photo)-[photoHasLabel:HAS_LABEL]->(label:Label)
RETURN alice, wroteReview, review, reviewToBusiness, business, businessToPhoto, photo, photoHasLabel, label, label.description, review.text, business.location

question: List the names and review texts from users based in Seattle for Electronics businesses that received reviews with ratings of 2 stars or fewer.
cypher:
MATCH (user:User)-[write:WROTE]->(review:Review)-[for:REVIEWS]->(business:Business)-[inCategory:IN_CATEGORY]->(category:Category),
      (business)-[inCity:IN_CITY]->(city:City)
WHERE city.name = "Seattle" AND category.name = "Electronics" AND review.stars <= 2
RETURN user, write, review, for, business, inCategory, category, inCity, city, review.text, user.name

question: For photos at Los Angeles businesses categorized as Restaurant with reviews on June 15, 2023, what are the HAS_LABEL relation scores?
cypher:
MATCH (business:Business)-[relation6:IN_CITY]->(city:City {name:"Los Angeles"}), 
      (business)-[relation7:IN_CATEGORY]->(category:Category {name:"Restaurant"}), 
      (business)-[relation8:HAS_PHOTO]->(photo:Photo)-[hasLabel:HAS_LABEL]->(label:Label),
      (review:Review)-[relation10:REVIEWS]->(business)
WHERE review.date = date("2023-06-15")
RETURN relation10, relation8, relation7, relation6, business, city, category, photo, hasLabel, label, review, hasLabel.score

question: Can you find the WROTE_TIP text for all tips made to businesses located in New York, categorized under Coffee & Tea, on the same day a 5-star review was posted?
cypher:
MATCH (user:User)-[wroteTip:WROTE_TIP]->(business:Business)-[inCategory:IN_CATEGORY]->(category:Category), 
      (review:Review)-[reviews:REVIEWS]->(business)-[inCity:IN_CITY]->(city:City)
WHERE city.name = "New York" AND category.name = "Coffee & Tea" AND review.date = wroteTip.date AND review.stars = 5
RETURN user, wroteTip, business, inCategory, category, review, reviews, inCity, city, wroteTip.text

question: Display the number of likes for tips authored by users from San Diego who are direct friends with Michael Smith, specifically those tips written on July 4th, 2022.
cypher:
MATCH (michaelSmith:User {name:"Michael Smith"})-[friendship:FRIENDS]->(friend:User)-[tipWritten:WROTE_TIP]->(business:Business)-[locatedIn:IN_CITY]->(city:City {name:"San Diego"})
WHERE tipWritten.date = date('2022-07-04')
RETURN michaelSmith, friendship, friend, tipWritten, business, locatedIn, city, tipWritten.likes

question: For the 2022 Black Friday event, I require the HAS_PHOTO relation specifics, including photo IDs and the respective reviewers, for the business Sams Electronics.
cypher:
MATCH (business:Business {name:"Sam's Electronics"})-[hasPhoto:HAS_PHOTO]->(photo:Photo)
MATCH (review:Review)-[reviews:REVIEWS]->(business)
MATCH (user:User)-[wrote:WROTE]->(review)
WHERE review.date >= date("2022-11-25") AND review.date <= date("2022-11-25")
RETURN business, hasPhoto, photo, review, reviews, user, wrote, photo.id

question: What is the average score of SIMILAR relations between users who have written reviews for businesses in the Italian Cuisine category within Philadelphia during 2023?
cypher:
MATCH (category:Category {name: "Italian Cuisine"})<-[inCategory:IN_CATEGORY]-(business:Business)-[inCity:IN_CITY]->(city:City {name: "Philadelphia"})
MATCH (user1:User)-[wrote:WROTE]->(review:Review)-[reviews:REVIEWS]->(business)
WHERE review.date.year = 2023
MATCH (user1)-[similar:SIMILAR]-(user2:User)
RETURN AVG(similar.score)

question: Can you calculate the minimum score among HAS_LABEL relations for photos connected to Beauty Salons in Miami?
cypher:
MATCH (category:Category {name: "Beauty Salons"})<-[inCategory:IN_CATEGORY]-(business:Business)-[inCity:IN_CITY]->(city:City {name: "Miami"}),
      (business)-[hasPhoto:HAS_PHOTO]->(photo:Photo)-[hasLabel:HAS_LABEL]->(label:Label)
RETURN MIN(hasLabel.score)

question: What is the total number of friends (FRIENDS relation) for users who have provided reviews with exactly 3 stars for businesses in the Retail category across all cities?
cypher:
MATCH (user:User)-[wrote:WROTE]->(review:Review)-[reviews:REVIEWS]->(business:Business)-[inCategory:IN_CATEGORY]->(category:Category)
WHERE review.stars = 3 AND category.name = "Retail"
WITH DISTINCT user
MATCH (user)-[friends:FRIENDS]-(friend:User)
RETURN COUNT(friends) AS totalNumberOfFriends

question: Show the maximum likes on any tip (WROTE_TIP relation) written to Barbecue restaurants in Austin that also received at least three reviews on the same day.
cypher:
MATCH (business:Business)-[relation5:IN_CATEGORY]->(category:Category {name: "Barbecue"}),
      (business)-[relation6:IN_CITY]->(city:City {name: "Austin"}),
      (user:User)-[wroteTip:WROTE_TIP]->(business),
      (review:Review)-[reviewsBusiness:REVIEWS]->(business)
WHERE review.date = wroteTip.date
WITH wroteTip, COUNT(review) AS reviewsCount
WHERE reviewsCount >= 3
RETURN MAX(wroteTip.likes)

question: Could you provide the count of unique photos (HAS_PHOTO relation) posted for all Car Dealerships in San Jose that have an average star rating over 4?
cypher:
MATCH (business:Business)-[relation5:IN_CATEGORY]->(category:Category),
      (business)-[relation6:IN_CITY]->(city:City),
      (business)<-[relation7:REVIEWS]-(review:Review),
      (business)-[relation8:HAS_PHOTO]-(photo:Photo)
WHERE category.name = "Car Dealerships" AND city.name = "San Jose"
WITH business, AVG(review.stars) AS average_stars, COUNT(DISTINCT photo) AS photo_count
WHERE average_stars > 4
RETURN SUM(photo_count) AS total_unique_photos

question: Determine the mean labeling score for pictures (HAS_LABEL relation) linked to businesses situated in Orlando that fall under the Fast Food category.
cypher:
MATCH (city:City {name: "Orlando"})<-[relation5:IN_CITY]-(business:Business)-[relation6:IN_CATEGORY]->(category:Category {name: "Fast Food"})
MATCH (business)-[relation7:HAS_PHOTO]->(photo:Photo)-[labelScore:HAS_LABEL]->(label:Label)
RETURN AVG(labelScore.score)

question: What are the category names associated with the Taco Bell business situated in San Diego?
cypher:
MATCH (business:Business {name:"Taco Bell", city:"San Diego"})-[inCategory:IN_CATEGORY]->(category:Category)
RETURN business, inCategory, category, category.name

question: List the name and address of the Business which has a review written on 2023-12-31 with exactly 5 stars.
cypher:
MATCH (business:Business)<-[reviews:REVIEWS]-(review:Review)
WHERE review.date = date("2023-12-31") AND review.stars = 5
RETURN business, reviews, review, business.name, business.address

question: Can you find the names of users who wrote a review for Starbucks in Seattle with more than 3 stars?
cypher:
MATCH (user:User)-[wrote:WROTE]->(review:Review)-[reviews:REVIEWS]->(business:Business {name:"Starbucks"}), (business)-[inCity:IN_CITY]->(city:City {name:"Seattle"})
WHERE review.stars > 3
RETURN user, wrote, review, reviews, business, inCity, city, user.name

question: Provide the ID and name of businesses in Las Vegas that belong to the category Nightlife.
cypher:
MATCH (business:Business)-[inCity:IN_CITY]->(city:City), (business)-[inCategory:IN_CATEGORY]->(category:Category)
WHERE city.name="Las Vegas" AND category.name="Nightlife"
RETURN business, inCity, city, inCategory, category, business.id, business.name

question: Find all the picture captions linked to the Walmart business situated in Austin.
cypher:
MATCH (business:Business {name:"Walmart", city:"Austin"})-[hasPhoto:HAS_PHOTO]->(photo:Photo)
RETURN business, hasPhoto, photo, photo.caption

question: Retrieve the names of the cities in which the Business named McDonalds exists.
cypher:
MATCH (business:Business {name:"McDonalds"})-[inCity:IN_CITY]->(city:City)
RETURN business, inCity, city, city.name

question: What is the score of the label assigned to the photo with ID P123?
cypher:
MATCH(photo:Photo {id:"P123"})-[hasLabel:HAS_LABEL]->(label:Label)
RETURN photo, hasLabel, label, hasLabel.score

question: How is the similarity score calculated between users UID1234 and UID5678?
cypher:
MATCH (user1:User {id:"UID1234"})-[similarity:SIMILAR]->(user2:User {id:"UID5678"})
RETURN user1, similarity, user2, similarity.score

question: What attributes are associated with the FRIENDS relation between user JohnDoe and JaneSmith?
cypher:
MATCH (userJohnDoe:User {name:"JohnDoe"})-[friends:FRIENDS]->(userJaneSmith:User {name:"JaneSmith"})
RETURN userJohnDoe, friends, userJaneSmith

question: Can you tell me, is there any specific score recorded for the HAS_LABEL relation corresponding to the photo with the caption sunset view?
cypher:
MATCH (photo:Photo {caption:"sunset view"})-[hasLabelRelation:HAS_LABEL]->(label:Label)
RETURN photo, hasLabelRelation, label, hasLabelRelation.score

question: What is the score of the similarity relation for users with IDs 45821 and 78214?
cypher:
MATCH (user1:User {id:"45821"})-[similarity:SIMILAR]->(user2:User {id:"78214"})
RETURN user1, similarity, user2, similarity.score

question: How many photos are associated with the Business Starbucks located in Seattle?
cypher:
MATCH (business:Business)-[photoRel:HAS_PHOTO]->(photo:Photo), (business)-[inCity:IN_CITY]->(city:City)
WHERE business.name="Starbucks" AND city.name="Seattle"
RETURN COUNT(DISTINCT photo)

question: What is the average stars rating for reviews written by User ID 90123 in the year 2023?
cypher:
MATCH (user:User {id:"90123"})-[wrote:WROTE]->(review:Review)-[reviews:REVIEWS]->(business:Business)
WHERE review.date.year = 2023
RETURN AVG(review.stars)

question: Can you determine the sum of SIMILAR relations where User ID 67890 has a score exceeding 0.8?
cypher:
MATCH (user:User {id:"67890"})-[similar:SIMILAR]->(node1:User)
WHERE similar.score > 0.8
RETURN COUNT(similar)

question: What is the maximum score among all HAS_LABEL relations for photos under the birthday party label?
cypher:
MATCH (label:Label {description: "birthday party"})<-[hasLabel:HAS_LABEL]-(photo:Photo)
RETURN MAX(hasLabel.score)

question: How many total likes did all the tips written by User JohnD in 2023 receive?
cypher:
MATCH (user:User {name:"JohnD"})-[wroteTip:WROTE_TIP]->(business:Business)
WHERE wroteTip.date.year = 2023
RETURN SUM(wroteTip.likes)

question: Provide the names of users who assessed businesses in Springfield with a 5-star rating.
cypher:
MATCH (user:User)-[wrote:WROTE]->(review:Review)-[reviews:REVIEWS]->(business:Business)-[inCity:IN_CITY]->(city:City)
WHERE city.name="Springfield" AND review.stars=5
RETURN user, wrote, review, reviews, business, inCity, city, user.name

question: Can you show the addresses and names of businesses that have reviews written on 1st January 2021 with more than 4 stars?
cypher:
MATCH (review:Review)-[wroteReview:REVIEWS]->(business:Business)
WHERE review.date = date("2021-01-01") AND review.stars > 4
RETURN review, wroteReview, business, business.name, business.address

question: What are the descriptions of labels linked to photos that have a partition value of 5 and are situated in businesses in Las Vegas?
cypher:
MATCH (city:City {name: "Las Vegas"})<-[inCity:IN_CITY]-(business:Business)-[hasPhoto:HAS_PHOTO]->(photo:Photo)-[hasLabel:HAS_LABEL]->(label:Label)
WHERE photo.partition = 5
RETURN city, inCity, business, hasPhoto, photo, hasLabel, label, label.description

question: Identify all business names that have been reviewed by users who are also authors of a tip with more than 100 likes.
cypher:
MATCH (user:User)-[wroteReview:WROTE]->(review:Review)-[reviewed:REVIEWS]->(business:Business), (user)-[wroteTip:WROTE_TIP]->(business)
WHERE wroteTip.likes > 100
RETURN user, wroteReview, review, reviewed, business, wroteTip, business.name

question: Which cities contain businesses that have been reviewed by John Doe and have photos depicting elegant ambiance?
cypher:
MATCH (user:User {name:"John Doe"})-[wrote:WROTE]->(review:Review)-[reviews:REVIEWS]->(business:Business)-[hasPhoto:HAS_PHOTO]->(photo:Photo)-[hasLabel:HAS_LABEL]->(label:Label), (business)-[inCity:IN_CITY]->(city:City)
WHERE label.description="elegant ambiance"
RETURN user, wrote, review, reviews, business, hasPhoto, photo, hasLabel, label, inCity, city, city.name

question: What are the ratings for the HAS_LABEL relations in images with captions that include mountain view from businesses classified under Outdoor Activities?
cypher:
MATCH (photo:Photo)-[hasLabel:HAS_LABEL]->(label:Label), (business:Business)-[categorized:IN_CATEGORY]->(category:Category)
WHERE photo.caption CONTAINS "mountain view" AND category.name = "Outdoor Activities"
RETURN photo, hasLabel, label, business, categorized, category, hasLabel.score

question: Provide the score attributes from SIMILAR relationships where each user involved has reviewed the same business and their ratings differ by at least 2 stars.
cypher:
MATCH (user1:User)-[similar:SIMILAR]->(user2:User)
MATCH (user1)-[wroteReview1:WROTE]->(review1:Review)-[forBusiness1:REVIEWS]->(business:Business),
      (user2)-[wroteReview2:WROTE]->(review2:Review)-[forBusiness2:REVIEWS]->(business)
WHERE ABS(review1.stars - review2.stars) >= 2
RETURN user1, similar, user2, wroteReview1, review1, forBusiness1, business, forBusiness2, review2, wroteReview2, similar.score

question: What are the average scores of the HAS_LABEL relation for all photos in a business under the category Hotels with a minimum rating of 4 stars?
cypher:
MATCH (business:Business)-[relation5:IN_CATEGORY]->(category:Category), (business)-[relation6:HAS_PHOTO]->(photo:Photo)-[hasLabel:HAS_LABEL]->(label:Label), (review:Review)-[relation8:REVIEWS]->(business)
WHERE category.name="Hotels" AND review.stars >= 4
RETURN relation8, relation6, relation5, business, category, photo, hasLabel, label, review, AVG(hasLabel.score)

question: List the ratings for IN_CATEGORY relationships where the enterprise is located in California and provides Spa services.
cypher:
MATCH (business:Business)-[inCategory:IN_CATEGORY]->(category:Category)
WHERE business.state = "California" AND category.name = "Spa services"
RETURN business, inCategory, category

question: Provide the maximum, minimum, and average scores in HAS_LABEL relations for photos tagged at businesses with more than 50 reviews.
cypher:
MATCH (business:Business)-[reviews:REVIEWS]-(review:Review)
WITH business, COUNT(review) AS totalReviews
WHERE totalReviews > 50
MATCH (business)-[relation5:HAS_PHOTO]->(photo:Photo)-[hasLabel:HAS_LABEL]->(label:Label)
RETURN MAX(hasLabel.score) AS MaximumScore, MIN(hasLabel.score) AS MinimumScore, AVG(hasLabel.score) AS AverageScore

question: What is the count of businesses reviewed by users who have written both reviews and tips for the same business and have ratings of either 1 or 5 stars?
cypher:
MATCH (user:User)-[wroteReview:WROTE]->(review:Review)-[reviewed:REVIEWS]->(business:Business),
      (user)-[wroteTip:WROTE_TIP]->(business)
WHERE review.stars = 1 OR review.stars = 5
RETURN COUNT(DISTINCT business)

question: Find the average star rating of reviews linked to businesses that are in the Fast Food category and have business photos taken in daytime.
cypher:
MATCH (review:Review)-[relation4:REVIEWS]->(business:Business)-[relation5:IN_CATEGORY]->(category:Category)
WHERE category.name="Fast Food"
MATCH (business)-[relation6:HAS_PHOTO]->(photo:Photo)
WHERE photo.label="daytime"
RETURN AVG(review.stars)
